description: Work inside the Manus sandbox to build, test, and debug faster. Automate the browser, manage files, edit code, and control terminals from one place. Initialize environments with secrets and package projects for deployment.

sandboxToken.description: Sandbox token for direct sandbox access

capabilities.name: upload_file_to_s3
capabilities.description: Upload a file to S3 storage. For large files, returns multipart upload information.

capabilities.name: multipart_upload_to_s3
capabilities.description: Upload large files to S3 using multipart upload with pre-signed URLs.

capabilities.name: download_file
capabilities.description: Download a file from the sandbox at the specified path.

capabilities.name: batch_download_attachments
capabilities.description: Download multiple files from URLs and optionally save them to a subfolder.

capabilities.name: get_browser_status
capabilities.description: Get the current status of the browser manager in the sandbox.

capabilities.name: execute_browser_action
capabilities.description: Execute a browser action such as navigation or interaction with page elements.

capabilities.name: text_editor_action
capabilities.description: Perform text editor actions such as opening, reading, or updating files.

capabilities.name: reset_terminal
capabilities.description: Reset a specific terminal session identified by terminal ID.

capabilities.name: reset_all_terminals
capabilities.description: Reset all active terminal sessions in the sandbox.

capabilities.name: view_terminal_history
capabilities.description: View the terminal history. Can return full history or only the latest output.

capabilities.name: kill_terminal_process
capabilities.description: Kill the current process running in the specified terminal.

capabilities.name: write_to_terminal
capabilities.description: Write input to a terminal process, optionally simulating an Enter key press.

capabilities.name: initialize_sandbox
capabilities.description: Initialize the sandbox environment by writing secrets to the .secrets directory.

capabilities.name: health_check
capabilities.description: Check the health status of the Manus sandbox service.

capabilities.name: zip_and_upload_project
capabilities.description: Zip a directory (excluding specified folders) and upload the archive to S3.
